name: Dr. Ayesha Rahman
description: Dr. Ayesha is known for her gentle approach and nutrition expertise. She creates personalized diet plans to improve overall pet health and immunity.

name: Dr. Farhan Ahmed
description: Dr. Farhan has successfully performed numerous complex surgeries. His precise techniques and calm nature help pets recover faster and safely.

name: Dr. Nusrat Jahan
description: Dr. Nusrat focuses on treating skin infections, fur loss, seasonal allergies, and long-term dermatological issues with modern treatment methods.

name: Dr. Rifat Hasan
description: Dr. Rifat helps pets overcome anxiety, aggression, and behavior issues. He guides pet owners to build trust, emotional bonding, and discipline.

name: Dr. Tamanna Karim
description: Dr. Tamanna emphasizes prevention-first care. She ensures timely vaccination schedules, parasite control plans, and general pet health routine checkups.

name: Dr. Mehedi Hasan
description: Dr. Mehedi handles emergency cases with quick and effective decision-making. He specializes in critical treatment and life-saving pet care support.
